Package cams.camp

Class Camp

java.lang.Object
cams.camp.Camp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Camp
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
The class Camp implements serializable. Allocate properties under certain data types. Allows for saving of object variables to user device
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • display

      public void display()
      Displays the camp's basic information. Does not display the visibility of the camp. Visibility attribute is hidden from the UI.

      Returns:
